title: Dorotej
occurrences: You didn't tell me how do they call you. - Dorotej.
Tell me, Dorotej, are those herbs really helpful?
What was your name again? - Dorotej.
Dorotej is a thaumaturge!
What do they say? - That Dorotej is a thaumaturge.
They say that Dorotej is a thaumaturge.
And you Dorotej, heal the ones you can, and comfort the ones you can't.
We're wasting time with this ignorant, Dorotej. - Who's ignorant?
I came, father bishop, to thank the God, and you healer, Dorotej. As you see, I'm healthy.
He sent Dorotej instead of his son!
He sent monk Dorotej to save you.
Dorotej? - Dorotej, my lord, like the heaven itself sent him.
Save us, Dorotej, help us! - Tell them to let us in!
Yes we can, but why did they give Dorotej a separate chamber?
Well, they gave it to the bishop too. - I asked why for Dorotej.
What is it, boy? What happened? - Dorotej the herbalist is gone? - Since when?
Is it Dorotej? - We don't know yet.
They say that Dorotej is guilty.
Dorotej can tell the difference between two weeds, a useful one from bad one,
And Dorotej said he didn't have any herbs for insomnia.
Archangels don't eat. - Archangel mentioned, the traitor Dorotej,
